comments:
I20070109-1805

Have a CVS project with an incoming addition of a *.properties or *.prefs file. Open the change -> NPE below.

Looks like a concurrency issue in the compare framework. When I set a breakpoint in StructureCreator.getStructure(Object) before line

		IDocument doc= CompareUI.getDocument(input);

then doc is not null and everything works fine, but when I set the breakpoint after this line, doc is null.


!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.jobs 4 2 2007-01-11 17:45:16.390
!MESSAGE An internal error occurred during: "Update comparison Copy of x.properties".
!STACK 0
